title: shatha ravi shOba
sahitya:
shata ravi shObha mAmava padmanAbha sharadindu vadana nIrada mEcakAbha

anupallavi

 shatamakha pUjita bhuvanaika bandhO sharaNa dAyaka viSNO kAruNya sindnO

caraNam

 tAmara sAkSa harE vEda vihAra tApasa gaNanuta vinata mandAra 
kAmada janArdana shAmala vidUra kAnana tulasI dalArcita hAra
